version.author: mrtnz
version.changelog: - keyboard passes through the script window, - arpeggio is inserted taking into account the current timebase of the midi item - (also taking into account the stretch of the item)

version.author: mrtnz
version.changelog: Bug fix: Library search error Version 1.0 contains a popup window, the new version 1.0.1 works without dialog window: Left click - use current channel. Left click + shift - create a new channel

version.author: mrtnz
version.changelog: Bug fix: Library search error 2 Added events: LMB - current channel, Shift+LMB create a new channel, Alt+LMB - create a new channel, saving the current one' Tooltip with events
